thread.title: Cuomo Faces Pressure to Let Female Lawmaker Into Harassment Talks

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Cuomo Faces Pressure to Let Female Lawmaker Into Harassment Talks
text:
ALBANY, N.Y.—As Gov. Andrew Cuomo and three male lawmakers meet privately to hash out a state sexual-harassment policy as part of the annual budget, they are facing calls to include the state’s only female caucus leader in the talks.
Mr. Cuomo vowed in February to include Senate Minority Leader Andrea Stewart-Cousins, a Democrat, in the otherwise all-male group amid calls for her inclusion from women’s rights groups. But with just a few days left before the budget deadline, Ms. Stewart-Cousins said Mr. Cuomo hasn’t followed...
